name: Amazon Product Scraper
description: Scrape product data from Amazon including prices, reviews, ratings, and descriptions. Perfect for competitive analysis and market research.

name: Twitter/X Scraper
description: Scrape tweets by hashtag or keyword for brand monitoring, sentiment analysis, and competitive intelligence.

name: Google SERP Scraper
description: Scrape Google search results for keyword research, rank tracking, and SEO competitive analysis.

inputs.name: query
inputs.label: Search Query
inputs.placeholder: e.g. best CRM for small business

name: Page CRO Analyzer
description: Analyze any landing page for conversion rate optimization. Identifies friction points, CTA effectiveness, trust signals, and provides actionable recommendations.

name: Copywriting Analyzer
description: Analyze and improve marketing copy using proven frameworks (PAS, AIDA, BAB). Scores headlines, CTAs, emotional triggers, and readability.

name: A/B Test Designer
description: Design statistically valid A/B tests for landing pages, emails, or ads. Calculates sample size, duration, and significance thresholds.

inputs.name: test_element
inputs.label: What to Test
inputs.placeholder: e.g. headline, CTA button color, pricing layout

name: Email Sequence Builder
description: Build automated email sequences for onboarding, nurture, re-engagement, or sales. Includes subject lines, timing, and segmentation rules.

name: SEO Audit Tool
description: Comprehensive SEO audit covering technical issues, on-page optimization, content gaps, and backlink analysis. Generates prioritized action plan.

name: Content Strategy Planner
description: Generate a 90-day content calendar with topics, formats, channels, and publishing schedule aligned to business goals.

name: Analytics Setup Guide
description: Plan and implement GA4, GTM, and event tracking. Creates tracking plan, data layer specs, and QA checklist.

name: Competitor Analysis
description: Deep-dive competitor analysis covering positioning, pricing, messaging, SEO strategy, and market gaps you can exploit.

name: Pricing Strategy Advisor
description: Analyze and optimize pricing strategy using value-based pricing frameworks. Includes tier design, anchoring, and A/B test recommendations.

name: User Onboarding Designer
description: Design user onboarding flows that maximize activation and reduce churn. Covers welcome sequences, feature discovery, and success milestones.

name: Ad Campaign Builder
description: Generate high-performing ad copy for Google Ads, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter. Includes headlines, descriptions, and CTA variations.

inputs.name: offer
inputs.label: Offer/Product
inputs.placeholder: e.g. Free automation audit for SMBs

name: Referral Program Designer
description: Design viral referral programs with incentive structures, tracking mechanics, and launch strategies that drive organic growth.

name: Social Media Planner
description: Generate 30 days of social media content with post templates, hashtags, scheduling, and engagement strategies across all platforms.

inputs.name: content_themes
inputs.label: Content Themes
inputs.placeholder: e.g. automation tips, case studies, behind-the-scenes...

name: Product Launch Planner
description: Plan product launches or feature announcements with timelines, channel strategy, PR outreach, and momentum campaigns.

name: Form Optimization
description: Optimize form completion rates by analyzing fields, layout, copy, trust signals, and error handling. Includes A/B test ideas.

name: Popup Optimizer
description: Design and optimize popups, modals, and overlays for lead capture. Covers timing, triggers, copy, and exit-intent strategies.

name: Signup Flow Optimizer
description: Optimize registration and trial signup flows to maximize conversions. Analyzes friction, social proof, and progressive disclosure.

name: Paywall Designer
description: Create in-app paywalls and upgrade prompts that convert free users to paid. Covers copy, feature gates, and pricing presentation.

inputs.name: trigger_event
inputs.label: Trigger Event
inputs.placeholder: e.g. 5 automations created, 100 records, trial day 7

name: Programmatic SEO Builder
description: Build SEO pages at scale using templates and data. Covers location pages, comparison pages, and integration directories.

inputs.name: data_source
inputs.label: Data Source
inputs.placeholder: Describe your data (CSV, API, database, etc.)

name: Schema Markup Generator
description: Generate JSON-LD schema markup for rich snippets. Covers articles, products, FAQs, reviews, events, and local business.

name: Copy Editor
description: Edit and polish existing marketing copy. Checks clarity, conciseness, tone, grammar, and conversion psychology.

name: Marketing Ideas Generator
description: Generate 139 proven marketing tactics across 12 categories. Customized for your business model, budget, and growth stage.

name: Psychology Framework
description: Apply 70+ psychological principles and mental models to marketing campaigns. Covers scarcity, social proof, anchoring, and more.

name: Free Tool Strategy
description: Design free tools/calculators for lead generation and SEO value. Covers ideation, MVP specs, and distribution strategy.

inputs.name: problem_to_solve
inputs.label: Problem to Solve
inputs.placeholder: What pain point does the tool address?

name: Product Context Setup
description: Create a reusable product marketing context document. Saves time by avoiding repetition across marketing tasks.
